card.text: Flying Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) Whenever this creature haunts a creature, gain control of that creature. It gains "{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return Strasiti, Willingly Possessed to the battlefield tapped"

card.name: The Monster, Artificial Wonder
card.text: Haste, menace {3}: Attach a noncreature artifact you control to this creature. For as long as it attached, it's an Equipment in addition to its other types with "Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is this spell mana value".

card.name: Strupen, Gorgon Queen
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a Gorgon you control attacks, it must be blocked this turn if able. Whenever a Gorgon you control destroy a creature, return that card to the battlefield tapped under your control. It's a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color" and it loses all other card types

card.name: The Macabre Dancers
card.text: Whenever you cast a instant or sorcery spell targeting only this creature, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may copy any amount of spell exiled by this creature, then cast those copy without paying their mana cost targeting it.

card.name: Leteti, Elusive Hunter
card.text: Flying, ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Whenever you put a counter on a creature without counters, draw a card. {3}{G}{U}: Monstrosity 2 (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Glavo, Headless Horseman
card.text: Double strike, vigilance, ward {3} Whenever this creature deal damage to an opponent, look at that player's hand and exile a nonland card from it. Until it leaves the battlefield, you may cast it and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

card.name: Ucenjak, Mad Demonist
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever you cast an artifact spell, mill cards equal to its mana value. Whenever this creature dies, return all artifact from your graveyard onto the battlefield. At the beginning of your next end step, exile them.

card.name: Volkodlak, Twisted Wolf
card.text: Trample Whenever a Wolf or Werewolf creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, destroy a noncreature, nonland permanent that player control with mana value less or equal to the damage dealt. They lose life equal to that permanent mana value.

card.name: Jakub, Pumpkin Knight
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, create a 2/2 green and white Plant Food creature artifact token with "{2}, {T}, sacrifice this card: You gain 3 life". Whenever you gain life, this creature deals that much damage to each opponents. This ability only trigger once per turn.

card.name: Jeklo, Foreign Golem
card.text: This creature gains +1/+1 for each artifact you control. Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.") {6}, Sacrifice three untapped artifacts you control: Exile target permanent.

card.name: Starejsi, Tired of Fighting
card.text: Flying, first strike, deathtouch, lifelink Whenever another creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and mill a card. At the beginning of your end step, put any number of target creature cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

card.name: Norcek, Joke's Punchline
card.text: Lifelink {1}{W}: This creature gains flying until end of turn Whenever a players gains life, they may sacrifice a permanent they control, then reveal the top card of their library. If it's land, they may put it onto the battlefield, otherwise, they may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Stvar, Lurking Creature
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, if you control a Island, a Swamp and a Forest, it can't be blocked this turn. Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, exile a card from each player's graveyard with a lurk counter. You may cast spells exiled with a lurk counter on them, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

card.name: Tujek, Unbeatable Undead
card.text: Haste, first strike, indestructible This creature must attack each turns if able. Whenever this creature attacks, you may put an Equipment card from your hand or your graveyard onto the battlefield, then attach it to this creature. You lose life equal to that card mana value.

card.name: Carovnica, Outskirt Hag
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn: • You gain 3 life • Discard a card, then draw a card • Add one mana of any color If you can't choose, this creature gets +3/+3, is a Beast in addition to its other types, gains menace, trample and vigilance and lose all other abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Locci, Castle's Heart
card.text: This creature gets +1/+1 for each Gates you control. Whenever this creature attacks, search you library for a Gate card and put it onto the battlefield under your control, then shuffle. Lands your opponents control on the battlefield lose all non-mana abilities.
